EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading A Primer on PCI Compliance with Pivotal Cloud Foundry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the A Primer on PCI Compliance with Pivotal Cloud Foundry white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- White Paper: Security and Compliance with Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/security-and-compliance-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]> - White Paper: Secure Hybrid Banking Reference Architectures for Cloud-Native Applications <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cloud-native-security/secure-hybrid-banking-reference-architectures-for-cloud-native-applications]]>
- Analyst Report: Refocusing Security in the DevOps Era: Enabling 'Secure by Default' <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/refocusing-security-in-the-devops-era]]> - Blog Post: How We Harden a Cloud Foundry Stemcell (So You Don’t Have to) <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/how-we-harden-a-cloud-foundry-stemcell-so-you-don-t-have-to]]>
- Video: Cloud-Native Security: Rotate, Repair, Repave <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cloud-native-security/cloud-native-security-rotate-repair-repave-justin-smith]]>
- eBook: Embarking on the Cloud-Native Journey to More Agile IT <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/embarking-on-the-cloud-native-journey-to-more-agile-it]]>
- Webinar Replay: Strategies on How to Overcome Security Challenges Unique to Cloud-Native Apps <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cloud-native-security/strategies-on-how-to-overcome-security-challenges-unique-to-cloud-native-apps]]>
- Blog Post: How Cloud-Native Platforms Help with Compliance and Security <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cloud-native-security/how-cloud-native-platforms-help-with-compliance-and-security]]>
- Web Page: Cloud-Native Security <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-security]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
